attributes.action: Lets Go to the the Olympic Games of China. 2008
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
China was granted the 2008 Games in the understanding that their HUMAN RIGHTS records would improve
IT IS NOW WORSE
FACTS
To build the stadiums the authorities forcibly evicted people from their homes.
Over 3 million people are locked up in political concentration camps.
They fund the Government of Sudan, despite the Tragedy of DARFUR the mounting death toll and human right abuses. S.SPIELBERG has walked away from his role in the games
The Backing of the JUNTA in BURMA whose human rights abuses is renowned.
THE ILLEGAL INVASION AND OCCUPATION OF TIBET continues to this day
Beijing’s air is so polluted that it will seriously damage the athlete’s performance
CHINA IS RESPONSIBLE FOR 90% of all FAKE GOODS produced in the world and are flooding the world with FAKE MEDICINE

OVER ONE MILLION PEOPLE DIE EACH YEAR IN AFRICA FROM FAKE MEDICINE 

I REQUEST THAT ALL ATHLETES TAKE A STANCE AND BOYCOTT THE GAMES 

I CALL ON THE UK & ALL GOVERMENTS TO BOYCOTT THE GAMES & IMPOSE TRADING RESTRICTIONS ON CHINA

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
